latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: Permittee/applicant submitted incomplete written safety plan
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
